"Azanami":
"What's this? Is this the first
time you've used a bullet bow?"

"Well, it doesn't really matter
if it's your first time or not."
"The most important thing is not the technique, but having a stout heart to sync your breathing."

"As long as you keep yourself
calm, your arrow won't miss.
Alright, see what you can do!"

"あれー？　もしかして
バレットボウを使うの、初めて？"

"ま、初めてでも、そうでなくても
別にいいんだけど。"

"大事なのは技術よりも
呼吸を合わせる強い心だからねー。"

"心に動揺がなきゃ
矢が的を外れることはないよ。
ま、がんばってみよー！"
